list.title: You own part of the mutual
list.content: You can buy cover and earn more SOTE by helping run the mutual, including voting on claims, deciding which smart contracts are secure and voting on proposals.

list.title: Distributed Autonomous Organization
list.content: Soteria is a blockchain-based organisation with a legal structure making sure that the members are not personally liable for the mutual as a whole. To obtain these benefits you need join the mutual by sign this agreement and pay the membership fee.

list.title: Membership costs 0.1 BNB
list.content: A small membership fee is the mutual requirement.

list.title: AML
list.content: To become a member, you will need to verify your identity following Anti-Money-Laundering process.
